data.title: A map of new home developments in the Greater Toronto Area
data.meta_description: Find new condo developments and new construction homes in Toronto, York Region, Peel Region, and surrounding areas. Select your area to view new homes for sale.
data.text:
Find new homes and condos in the Greater Toronto Area

We have details on new home developments throughout the Greater Toronto Area. Use the map below to find details and locations of some of the latest and hottest housing developments in and around Toronto. Alternatively, you can view new construction projects by region by clicking on your chosen area below the map:

Upper East Side Unionville

A new collection of towns and detached homes in a fantastic and popular Markham location
